item.description:
MA Yinghao (马英浩) is a master student of School of Music, College of Fine Arts, CMU, majoring in Music and Technology. His research interests include Music Information Retrieval, Audio Signal Processing, Machine Learning and Probability Theory. His goal is to gain further understanding on auditory signals especially music, with information technology and probability theory.

Besides, he was one of student conductors of Chinese Philharmonic Orchestra, Chinese Music Institute at PKU (see at Facebook). He is also an advocate of charitable activities (see at other experience).
